channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Death toll from attack at Michigan church stays at 4 after police sweep charred ruins
item.description: Authorities in Michigan say search crews did not find any additional bodies inside a Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints chapel where a former Marine opened fire and set the building ablaze, killing four people.

item.title: Lawyer for suspect in Charlie Kirk killing wants more time to review ‘voluminous’ evidence
From drones to police presence, Utah campus where Kirk was shot lacked key public safety tools
